CardModel

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardModel.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Sumit Punjabi This Class creates a Deck of Cards using the Card object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()

    • Method Detail

      • newDeck

        public void newDeck()
        This method creates a new deck of cards. Iterates over Suits and Ranks in a nested loop and populates the ArraList cardDeck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        This function shuffles the Deck of cards. It is based on the Fisher-Yates Shuffle also known as Knuth Shuffle. Create a Random class instance and use it to generate a random int in the range of cardDeck size. Use the random int to get the Card at that location in the list and swap that with the card at current the loop index.

      • dealCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> dealCards(int totalCards)
        This function deals cards to the players. Create an instance of Random class and generate a random int in the range of cardDeck size. Remove the Card at that location and return it.
        Returns:
        A Card object removed from a random index in cardDeck

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        This function draws a single card from the deck removes and returns it.
        Returns:
        a Card object drawn randomly
